name: tm21
effect: Teaches Frustration to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Frustration to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Mega Drain)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: The less the user likes you, the more powerful this move.
flavor_text.emerald: The less the user likes you, the more powerful this move.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: This attack move grows more powerful the less the user likes its TRAINER.
